CustomField.description: Is contact eligible to be emailed. Make sure they have a valid email and they're a Sales Contact or a Mirror of a Referral Contact
CustomField.formula: AND(ISNULL( EmailBouncedDate), (ISBLANK( Email_Verification__c) || NOT(CONTAINS(Email_Verification__c ,"Threat"))) , NOT(HasOptedOutOfEmail), NOT(No_Longer_With_Company__c), OR(Sales_Contact__c, Mirror_Ref_Ctct__c != null), NOT( ISBLANK(Email )), Mirror_Ref_Ctct__c == null || NOT( ISBLANK( Mirror_Ref_Ctct__r.Email__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is contact eligible to be emailed
CustomField.label: EligibleToEmail
